item.title: How Fast is Zig?
item.author: susmitislam31@gmail.com (Entropic Legos)
item.description: Zig is certainly one of the more fun languages I’ve coded in. But how fast is it? Let’s compare it with some other top contenders, such as C, Rust, and Go. For scale, we will also put to test one of the more popular interpreted languages, Python. But How Do We Measure Their Speed? As computers are stupendously fast these days, they perform most tasks in the blink of an eye.
